text: <@U01APB2TUDU> what type of records do you want to include? when you say DB means contact properties?

<@UBZ8C6DTK> I want to send a list of best job offers for every user. Think of the following data structure attached to every contact:

```[{
  company_name: "Apple",
  company_avatar: "http://....",
  price: 500 
}, {
  company_name: "Google",
  company_avatar: "http://....",
  price: 200 
}]```
The idea was to create a multiline field to store this json, but `fromjson` applied to this field gives me empty result
